full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Handheld XRF Analyzer
------

### Notice: Request for Proposal

A request for proposal has been issued for the supply of a handheld X-ray fluorescence (XRF) analyzer to the Department of Health.

### Tender Details
* **Contract Summary**: 1 unit of Handheld XRF analyzer.
* **Delivery Location**: Ottawa, ON, must be delivered on or before March 31, 2023.
* **Contract Period**: From the date of contract award to one year after delivery and acceptance, inclusive.

### Tender Requirements
* **Bidder Eligibility**: Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.
* **Proposal Submission**: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 20, 2022, by 14:00 EDT.
* **Late Submissions**: All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be considered non-responsive.

### Important Note
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time, as the revised closing time is 14:00 EDT on October 20, 2022.

### Submission Documents
The Request for Proposal, including the mandatory requirements, is available for download on Ariba Discovery. Interested bidders can access the document by visiting the link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14274690?extsite=MTQyNzQ2OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Contact Information
For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact:

* Lisa Golab, Procurement Officer
* Email: [lisa.golab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa.golab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
